Package com.topjohnwu.superuser.io

package com.topjohnwu.superuser.io
This package is no longer actively maintained. Please migrate to use classes in com.topjohnwu.superuser.nio if possible.

Usage of all classes in this package is discouraged, as their behaviors depend on the shell environment, and getting a reliable/consistent environment is difficult.

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    SuFile
    A File implementation using root shell.
    SuFileInputStream
    Open InputStreams that read files with root access.
    SuFileOutputStream
    Open OutputStreams that read files with root access.
    SuRandomAccessFile
    Access files using the main shell and mimics RandomAccessFile.
